name: Growforth
description:
NOTE:  to view background images, you have to hit "join" on this Google Photos album. Sorry! https://photos.app.goo.gl/Bkn2Di14vM3VShbe8

Growforth was made as a student project, as part of a class about learning the game development process. We certainly learned a lot making this game, and we hope you enjoy!

-Ta-Dah! Games

(Yes, we used a bad image hosting site. Sorry!)
